mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_commission_order ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, installment, start_date, end_date, tuition_fee, per_term_tuition_fee, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{installment}, #{userId}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tuitionFee}, #{perTermTuitionFee}, #{remarks}, 0);
